amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities and Villages; Laws Applicable to All
amendatorysection.para: For the purpose of creating a fund out of which anti-pollution-of-water measures may be financed, any city or village in this state is hereby authorized and empowered to make a special levy of not exceeding three and five-tenths cents on each one hundred dollars upon the taxable value of all the taxable property within any such municipality, the proceeds thereof to be used for such purpose.
